changeSet.comment: Removing Merge germplasm permission for roles that do not have Full permissions.
changeSet.sql:
# Insert inherited permissions of GERMPLASM and MANAGE GERMPLASM. INSERT INTO role_permission(role_id,permission_id) SELECT rti.role_id, pti.permission_id FROM (SELECT DISTINCT(rp.role_id) AS role_id FROM role_permission rp INNER JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE p.name IN ('GERMPLASM', 'MANAGE_GERMPLASM') GROUP BY rp.role_id ) rti CROSS JOIN (SELECT permission_id FROM permission WHERE name IN ( 'IMPORT_GERMPLASM', 'MG_MANAGE_INVENTORY', 'SEARCH_GERMPLASM', 'IMPORT_GERMPLASM_UPDATES', 'GERMPLASM_LABEL_PRINTING', 'EDIT_GERMPLASM', 'DELETE_GERMPLASM','CODE_GERMPLASM', 'GROUP_GERMPLASM', 'UNGROUP_GERMPLASM', 'VIEW_GERMPLASM_CHANGE_HISTORY') ) pti;
# Delete GERMPLASM and MANAGE GERMPLASM permissions from roles that do not have Full permissions. DELETE role_permission FROM role_permission WHERE permission_id IN (SELECT p.permission_id FROM permission p WHERE p.name in ('GERMPLASM','MANAGE_GERMPLASM')) AND role_id IN (SELECT subA.role_id FROM (SELECT rp.role_id AS role_id FROM role_permission rp WHERE rp.role_id IN ( SELECT subB.rid FROM ( SELECT rp.role_id AS rid FROM role_permission rp INNER JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE p.name in ('GERMPLASM','MANAGE_GERMPLASM') GROUP BY rp.role_id ) AS subB ) ) AS subA );
